leftTextPosition.title: Text Position from Left
leftTextPosition.description: Enter a percentage value (without a '%' sign) to position text horizontally from the left (Default is 50)

topTextPosition.title: Text Position from Top
topTextPosition.description: Enter a percentage value (without a '%' sign) to position text vertically from the top (Default is 50)

solidBgFill.title: Background Primary Color
solidBgFill.description: Choose the background color (Choose from color-palette or enter hexcode or rgb value or color name) (Default- transparent)

promoText.title: Promo Line / Top Line
promoText.description: Enter a Promo Line/Top Line text.

promoTextColor.title: Promo Line / Top Line Text Color
promoTextColor.description: Choose the promo line / top line text color (Choose from color-palette or enter hexcode or rgb value or color name)

promoTextSize.title: Promo Line / Top Line Text Size
promoTextSize.description: Choose the Promo Line / Top Line text Size

bylineTextColor.title: Byline / Disclaimer Text Color
bylineTextColor.description: Choose the byline / disclaimer text color (Choose from color-palette or enter hexcode or rgb value or color name)

bylineTextSize.title: Byline / Disclaimer Text Size
bylineTextSize.description: Choose the byline / disclaimer text Size

backgroundOpacity.title: Background Opacity
backgroundOpacity.description: Enter a percentage value (without a '%' sign) to add the text background opacity.

mobileTextPosition.title: Mobile: Text Position
mobileTextPosition.description: Select the position of header text block w.r.t banner.

componentMaxWidth.title: Component Max Width
componentMaxWidth.description: Enter component's max width.(Default: Full Bleed)

marqueeVariation.title: Apply marquee text?
marqueeVariation.description: On check, Banner headline will converts into marquee text.

marqueeTextSpeed.title: Marquee Text Speed
marqueeTextSpeed.description: Please enter Marquee text speed in seconds.(Default: 10s, Min - 1s, Max - 800s)

gradientColor.title: Background Gradient Secondary Color
gradientColor.description: Choose the gradient color (Choose from color-palette or enter hexcode or rgb value or color name) (Default - Starts from top left to bottom right)

gradientType.title: Gradient Type
gradientType.description: Select the Gradient Type( Default - Diagonal)

headerBlockPosition.title: Select Header Block Position
headerBlockPosition.description: Select header block position w.r.t inline image. (Default - top most)
